### getOrCreateFrameHelper() {#a138bc82a9943aa3008ab86bec2d2c91a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Function &#42; getOrCreateFrameHelper (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> &#42; MMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; unsigned &gt; &amp; Regs, <a href="#abc5baba59c735eeb15bdef969b458794">FrameHelperType</a> Type, unsigned FpOffset=0)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a unique function if a helper can be formed with the given Regs and frame type.

1) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;! ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ret

2) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;! ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; add fp, sp, #32 ret

3) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: mov x16, x30 ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93; ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48 ret x16

4) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;TAIL&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22: ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93; ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93; ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48 ret 
<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="M">module</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="MMI">machine module info</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Regs">callee save regs that the helper will handle</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="<a href=&quot;/docs/api/classes/llvm/type&quot;>Type</a>">frame helper type</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
a helper function
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Return a unique function if a helper can be formed with the given Regs</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and frame type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;!    ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ret</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-32&#93;!    ; x29/x30 has been stored at the caller</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">///    add fp, sp, #32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ret</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment">///    mov x16, x30</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ret x16</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 4) &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;TAIL&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ret</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param M module</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param MMI machine module info</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param Regs callee save regs that the helper will handle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param Type frame helper type</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @return a helper function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Lower a HOM&#95;Epilog pseudo instruction into a helper call while</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="comment">/// creating the helper on demand. Or emit a sequence of loads in place when not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="comment">/// using a helper call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 With a helper including ret</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="comment">///    HOM&#95;Epilog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22              ; MBBI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ret                                                  ; NextMBBI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="comment">///    =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="comment">///    b &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;TAIL&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ...                                                  ; NextMBBI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 With a helper</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="comment">///    HOM&#95;Epilog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="comment">///    =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="comment">///    bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;EPILOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 Without a helper</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="comment">///    HOM&#95;Epilog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="comment">///    =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="comment">///    ldp x22, x21, &#91;sp&#93;, #48</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Lower a HOM&#95;Prolog pseudo instruction into a helper call while</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="comment">/// creating the helper on demand. Or emit a sequence of stores in place when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="comment">/// not using a helper call.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 With a helper including frame-setup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="comment">///    HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22, 32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="comment">///    =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #-16&#93;!</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="comment">///    bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;FRAME32&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 With a helper</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="comment">///    HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="comment">///    =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp x29, x30, &#91;sp, #-16&#93;!</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="comment">///    bl &#95;OUTLINED&#95;FUNCTION&#95;PROLOG&#95;x30x29x19x20x21x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 Without a helper</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="comment">///    HOM&#95;Prolog x30, x29, x19, x20, x21, x22</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="comment">///    =&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp  x22, x21, &#91;sp, #-48&#93;!</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp  x20, x19, &#91;sp, #16&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="comment">///    stp  x29, x30, &#91;sp, #32&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AArch64LowerHomogeneousPE::lowerProlog(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;NextMBBI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;MF = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad5f691fdc1a09aaf6df5fef958b35a3d">MBBI</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.isReg()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.getReg().isValid()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.getReg() == AArch64::LR)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">          LRIdx = Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For now we are only expecting unpaired GP registers which should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!HasUnpairedReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">      Regs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(MO.getReg());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MO.isImm()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Allow compact unwind case only for oww.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> % 2 == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
